title: APA Format — apa
text: function formats decimals leading zeroes creating reports scientific style.

title: APA Format — apa
text: value set numeric values, either single number, vector, set columns. decimals number decimal points desired output. leading Logical value: TRUE leading zeroes decimals FALSE leading zeroes decimals. default TRUE.

title: APA Format — apa
text: function creates "pretty" character vectors numeric variables   printing part report. value can take single number,   matrix, vector, multiple columns data frame, long   numeric. values coerced numeric characters   logical values, process may result error values   truly alphabetical.

what: \(d_s\) for Between Subjects with Pooled SD Denominator — calculate_d
title: \(d_s\) for Between Subjects with Pooled SD Denominator — calculate_d
text: function displays d two subjects groups gives central non-central confidence interval using pooled standard deviation denominator.

title: \(d_s\) for Between Subjects with Pooled SD Denominator — calculate_d
code: calculate_d(m1, m2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2, a = 0.05)

title: \(d_s\) for Between Subjects with Pooled SD Denominator — calculate_d
text: m1 mean group one m2 mean group two sd1 standard deviation group one sd2 standard deviation group two n1 sample size group one n2 sample size group two significance level

title: \(d_s\) for Between Subjects with Pooled SD Denominator — calculate_d
text: Provides effect size (Cohen's *t*) associated central non-central confidence intervals, *t*-statistic, confidence intervals associated means group, well standard deviations standard errors means group. one-tailed confidence interval also included sensitivity analyses. d effect size dlow lower level confidence interval d value dhigh upper level confidence interval d value M1 mean group one sd1 standard deviation group one mean se1 standard error group one mean M1low lower level confidence interval group one mean M1high upper level confidence interval group one mean M2 mean group two sd2 standard deviation group two mean se2 standard error group two mean M2low lower level confidence interval group two mean M2high upper level confidence interval group two mean spooled pooled standard deviation sepooled pooled standard error n1 sample size group one n2 sample size group two df degrees freedom (n1 - 1 + n2 - 1) t t-statistic p p-value estimate d statistic confidence interval APA style markdown printing statistic t-statistic APA style markdown printing

title: \(d_s\) for Between Subjects with Pooled SD Denominator — calculate_d
text: calculate \(d_s\), mean two subtracted mean one divided pooled standard deviation. $$d_s = \frac{M_1 - M_2}{S_{pooled}}$$

title: Visualization for Estimating \(d_s\) — estimate_d
code: estimate_d(   m1 = NULL,   m2 = NULL,   sd1 = NULL,   sd2 = NULL,   n1 = NULL,   n2 = NULL,   d = NULL )

title: Visualization for Estimating \(d_s\) — estimate_d
text: m1 mean first group m2 mean second group sd1 standard deviation first group sd2 standard deviation second group n1 sample size first group n2 sample size second group d estimate effect size

title: Visualization for Estimating \(d_s\) — estimate_d
text: Returns pretty graph d effect size
